ej1ficheros1v1 module

Goal of the program: Saving a prime number list in a text file. By Fran Ogallas Start date: 4th of April 2024. Last version: 4th of April 2024.

ej1ficheros1v1.is_prime(number)

Detects if a number is prime

Parámetros:

number

Devuelve:

bool

Raises:

Value error if it receives a float

ej1ficheros1v1.main()
Devuelve:

A txt with a list of prime numbers in it
